title: League of legends
body: I open my league of legends and click in launch and he doesnt launch , and i go to task managment and his closed.. what shoud i do?

replies.body:
its not working and i already made this Delete the folder: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_launcher
Re-open LoL. During this time the badge will show as it redownloads the files. Please do not click the badge until it either disappears of LoL opens. already unistall, shoud i use cc cleaner and try repair? WHAT SHOUD I DO

Thanks for the update!  If the guide hasn't helped, hit us up in a [player support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can look into this further and help out.  I also recommend grabbing our [hextech repair tool kit](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) and attaching the logs it automatically obtains to your ticket.  We'll respond asap!

Your OS needs to permit the patcher to launch, but an issue with your settings or something else may be preventing it.  I recommend going over the instructions in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any issues afterwards!
